name: VRF Coordinator V2
description: The VRF Coordinator contract provides a way to securely request randomness from Chainlink VRF nodes.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Created
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subscription is created.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Owner
parameterDecorators.description: The owner of the subscription.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Funded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subscription is funded.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Old Balance
parameterDecorators.description: The old balance of the subscription.

parameterDecorators.name: New Balance
parameterDecorators.description: The new balance of the subscription.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Consumer Added
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a consumer is added to a subscription.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Consumer
parameterDecorators.description: The consumer address.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Consumer Removed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a consumer is removed from a subscription.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Consumer
parameterDecorators.description: The consumer address.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Canceled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subscription is canceled.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Owner Transfer Requested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subscription owner transfer is requested.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: From
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer the subscription from.

parameterDecorators.name: To
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer the subscription to.

eventDecorators.name: Subscription Owner Transfered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a subscription owner transfer is completed.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: From
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer the subscription from.

parameterDecorators.name: To
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer the subscription to.

eventDecorators.name: Proving Key Registered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a proving key is registered.

parameterDecorators.name: Key Hash
parameterDecorators.description: The key hash of the proving key.

parameterDecorators.name: Oracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the proving oracle.

eventDecorators.name: Proving Key Deregistered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a proving key is deregistered.

parameterDecorators.name: Key Hash
parameterDecorators.description: The key hash of the proving key.

parameterDecorators.name: Oracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the proving oracle.

eventDecorators.name: Random Words Requested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a random words request is made.

parameterDecorators.name: Key Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the key used for the random number generation.

parameterDecorators.name: Request Id
parameterDecorators.description: The request ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Pre Seed
parameterDecorators.description: the pre-seed used for the random number generation.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub Id
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Minimum Request Confirmations
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum number of confirmations before the request is considered fulfilled.

parameterDecorators.name: Callback Gas Limit
parameterDecorators.description: The gas limit for the callback function.

parameterDecorators.name: Num Words
parameterDecorators.description: The number of random words to be generated.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account that initiated the request.

eventDecorators.name: RandomWordsFullfilled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a random words request is fulfilled.

parameterDecorators.name: Request Id
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the fulfilled request.

parameterDecorators.name: Output Seed
parameterDecorators.description: The resulting random number that was generated.

parameterDecorators.name: Payment
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of LINK tokens paid to the Chainlink node for fulfilling the request.

parameterDecorators.name: Success
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the request was fulfilled.

eventDecorators.name: Config Set
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the configuration is set.

parameterDecorators.name: Minimum Request Confirmations
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum number of confirmations before the request is considered fulfilled.

parameterDecorators.name: Max Gas Limit
parameterDecorators.description: The gas limit for the callback function.

parameterDecorators.name: Staleness Seconds
parameterDecorators.description: The number of seconds after which a VRF response is considered stale.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas After Payment Calculation
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of gas to be added to a VRF request after the payment has been calculated.

parameterDecorators.name: Fallback Wei Per Unit Link
parameterDecorators.description: The fallback price for LINK tokens, used if no other price can be obtained.

parameterDecorators.name: Fee Config
parameterDecorators.description: The fee configuration (fee is charged per fulfillment in milionths of link).

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 1
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 1.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 2
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 2.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 3
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 3.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 4
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 4.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 5
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 5.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 2
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 2.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 3
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 3.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 4
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 4.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 5
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 5.

constructorDecorators.name: Constructor
constructorDecorators.description: Initializes the contract with the provided addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: Link
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LinkToken contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Blockhash Store
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the BlockhashStore contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Link Eth Feed
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the AggregatorV3Interface contract, which is used to fetch the latest price of LINK/ETH.

functionDecorators.name: Register Proving Key
functionDecorators.description: Registers a proving key to an oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: Address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: Public Proving Key
parameterDecorators.description: Key that oracle can use to submit vrf fulfillments.

functionDecorators.name: Deregister Proving Key
functionDecorators.description: Deregisters a proving key from an oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: Public Proving Key
parameterDecorators.description: Key that oracle can use to submit vrf fulfillments.

functionDecorators.name: Hash Of Key
functionDecorators.description: Returns the proving key hash key associated with the provided public key.

parameterDecorators.name: Public Key
parameterDecorators.description: The key to return the hash of.

functionDecorators.name: Set Config
functionDecorators.description: Sets the configuration for the VRFV2 coordinator.

parameterDecorators.name: Minimum Request Confirmations
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum number of confirmations required for a request to be fulfilled.

parameterDecorators.name: Max Gas Limit
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be used to fulfill a request.

parameterDecorators.name: Staleness Seconds
parameterDecorators.description: The number of seconds after which a VRF response is considered stale.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas After Payment Calculation
parameterDecorators.description: Gas used in doing accounting after completing the gas measurement.

parameterDecorators.name: Fallback Wei Per Unit Link
parameterDecorators.description: The fallback price for LINK tokens in the case of a stale feed.

parameterDecorators.name: Fee Config
parameterDecorators.description: The fee configuration (fee is charged per fulfillment in milionths of link).

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 1
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 1.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 2
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 2.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 3
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 3.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 4
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 4.

parameters.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 5
parameters.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 5.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 2
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 2.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 3
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 3.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 4
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 4.

parameters.name: Reqs For Tier 5
parameters.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 5.

returnDecorators.name: Minimum Request Confirmations
returnDecorators.description: The minimum number of confirmations required for a request to be fulfilled.

returnDecorators.name: Max Gas Limit
returnDecorators.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be used to fulfill a request.

returnDecorators.name: Staleness Seconds
returnDecorators.description: The number of seconds after which a VRF response is considered stale.

returnDecorators.name: Gas After Payment Calculation
returnDecorators.description: Gas used in doing accounting after completing the gas measurement.

functionDecorators.name: Get Fee Config
functionDecorators.description: Returns the vrf coordinator fee configuration.

returnDecorators.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 1
returnDecorators.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 1.

returnDecorators.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 2
returnDecorators.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 2.

returnDecorators.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 3
returnDecorators.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 3.

returnDecorators.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 4
returnDecorators.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 4.

returnDecorators.name: Fulfillment Flat Fee Link PPM Tier 5
returnDecorators.description: The flat fee for fulfilling a request in milionths of link for tier 5.

returnDecorators.name: Reqs For Tier 2
returnDecorators.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 2.

returnDecorators.name: Reqs For Tier 3
returnDecorators.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 3.

returnDecorators.name: Reqs For Tier 4
returnDecorators.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 4.

returnDecorators.name: Reqs For Tier 5
returnDecorators.description: The number of fulfilled requests required to reach tier 5.

functionDecorators.name: Get Total Balance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total balance of LINK available to the coordinator.

returnDecorators.name: Total Balance
returnDecorators.description: The total balance of LINK available to the coordinator.

functionDecorators.name: Get Fallback Wei Per Unit Link
functionDecorators.description: Returns the fallback wei per unit link.

returnDecorators.name: Fallback Wei Per Unit Link
returnDecorators.description: The fallback wei per unit link.

functionDecorators.name: Owner Cancel Subscription
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to cancel a subscription and sends remaining link directly to the subscription owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Subscription ID
parameterDecorators.description: The subscription ID to cancel.

functionDecorators.name: Recover Funds
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to recover any LINK balance on the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: To
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send LINK to.

functionDecorators.name: Request Random Words
functionDecorators.description: Request a set of random words.

parameterDecorators.name: Key Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Corresponds to a particular oracle job which uses that key for generating the VRF proof.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub Id
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the VRF subscription.

parameterDecorators.name: Request Confirmations
parameterDecorators.description: How many blocks you'd like the oracle to wait before responding to the request.

parameterDecorators.name: Callback Gas Limit
parameterDecorators.description: How much gas you'd like to receive in your fulfillRandomWords callback.

parameterDecorators.name: Num Words
parameterDecorators.description: The number of uint256 random values you'd like to receive in your fulfillRandomWords callback.

returnDecorators.name: Request ID
returnDecorators.description: The ID of the request.

functionDecorators.name: Get Commitment
functionDecorators.description: Returns the commitment for a given request ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Request ID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the request.

returnDecorators.name: Commitment
returnDecorators.description: The commitment for the given request ID.

functionDecorators.name: Get Fee Tier
functionDecorators.description: Compute fee based on the request count.

parameterDecorators.name: Req Count
parameterDecorators.description: The number of fulfilled requests.

returnDecorators.name: Fee PPM
returnDecorators.description: The fee in LINK PPM

functionDecorators.name: Fulfill Random Words
functionDecorators.description: Fulfills a random number request. This function is called by the VRF Coordinator.

parameterDecorators.name: Proof
parameterDecorators.description: Contains the proof and randomness.

parameters.name: Pk
parameters.description: A 256-bit public key used in the VRF computation.

parameters.name: Gamma
parameters.description: A 256-bit random value used in the VRF computation.

parameters.name: C
parameters.description: A 256-bit value used in the VRF computation.

parameters.name: S
parameters.description: A 256-bit value used in the VRF computation.

parameters.name: Seed
parameters.description: A 256-bit random value generated by the VRF computation.

parameters.name: U Witness
parameters.description: An Ethereum address that witnessed the VRF computation.

parameters.name: C Gamma Witness
parameters.description: An array of two 256-bit values that witnessed the VRF computation.

parameters.name: S Hash Witness
parameters.description: An array of two 256-bit values that witnessed the VRF computation.

parameters.name: Z Ivn
parameters.description: A 256-bit value used in the VRF computation.

parameterDecorators.name: Request Commitment
parameterDecorators.description: Request commitment pre-image, committed to at request time

parameters.name: Block Num
parameters.description: The block number of the request.

parameters.name: Sub Id
parameters.description: The ID of the VRF subscription.

parameters.name: Callback Gas Limit
parameters.description: The gas limit for the callback function that will be called when the VRF response is received.

parameters.name: Num Words
parameters.description: The number of words that the VRF response will consist of..

parameters.name: Sender
parameters.description: The address of the request sender.

functionDecorators.name: Oracle Withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw LINK earned through fulfilling requests.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send the LINK to.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of LINK to withdraw.

returnDecorators.name: Sub ID
returnDecorators.description: The current subscription ID.

functionDecorators.name: Pending Request Exists
functionDecorators.description: Used to disable subscription canceling while outstanding request are present.

parameterDecorators.name: Sub Id
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the subscription.

returnDecorators.name: Exists
returnDecorators.description: True if there is a pending request for the subscription.
